data.1: WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,
data.2: And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,
data.3: When the earth is stretched out taut
data.4: And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,
data.5: And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,
data.6: O man, you have to strive and go on striving towards your Lord, then will you meet Him.
data.7: And he who is given his ledger in his right hand
data.9: And will return to his people full of joy.
data.10: But he who is given his ledger from behind his back
data.12: But will be roasted in the fire.
data.13: He lived rejoicing among his people,
data.15: Why not? His Lord was always watching him.
data.16: So indeed I call to witness the evening twilight,
data.17: And the night and all it gathers,
data.18: And the moon when at the full,
data.19: That you will climb from stage to stage.
data.20: So, wherefore do they not believe?
data.21: And when the Qur´an is recited to them do not bow in adoration?
data.23: But God knows what they harbour in their breasts.
data.24: So give them news of painful punishment,
data.25: Except those who believe and do the right: For them there is reward unending.
